name: Here and Now: Edition 3 (Entry Pass)
description:
On sale: 22nd October 4pm EDT, 8pm UTC

Entry Pass is only valid to view the experience from 31st October- 6th Nov, 2021

Here and Now is a groundbreaking immersive 3d experience showcasing artists both emerging and established. 

MAIN SHOWCASE
Rubenfro
Jenni Pasanen
Tim Maxwell
Linda Dounia
Kira Bursky
Classic Katsara

HOW IT WORKS

1. Buy this NFT
2. Between Oct 31st - Nov 6th visit https://wideawakeprojects.com/tower/

This is the third edition of Here and Now. Beets is dedicated to doing six editions in totals.

If you would like to join Here and Now as a ticketholder please get in touch via the discord.

https://discord.gg/yxVN2E87jq

**this is not a ticket and comes with no future utility or benefits, those are reserved for Here and Now ticketholders only**
